page.title: 12AT SCHOOL
page.content: {Stoke Damerel Primary School} is 110 years old and has 300 children between the ages of 5 and 11 years. Most classes have about 30 children. There are plans for a new building in a few years. School starts at 08.50. After assembly we go back to our classes and do some{maths}and some{english}work for an hour before going out to play for 15 minutes. We then come in for an hour until lunchtime at 12.05. Some people have packed lunches; some people have school dinners or have their lunch at home. School starts at 13.25. We have two more one hour lessons and go home at 15.30. Most people like school, but it depends on what lesson you are having. Most people like{Art}or{Physical Education. Other subjects include{projects}or {music. Computers}have been introduced in the last few years.
